name: Beasts from the Bog
description:
Play this game. Love this game. Do this thing. I tell you.

Your vacation with your dad is not going the way you planned. Your plane crashed landed on an uncharted island and your Dad is in bad shape. Worse yet, something is WRONG with this island. What is this lurking fear that makes your spine tingle...your hands shake...and your breath quicken? A malignant presence looms near by. I fear that a malfunctioning plane is only the second worst thing to happen to you today...

Instructions:
Defend your Dad from the oncoming evil onslaught that draws toward you. Fight with your weapon and build defensive structures to ensure you and your dad's survival.

A crawling chaos hungers for your flesh. Answer it's beckoning call with hot lead and your iron will to survive!
